title: Case-Based Learning Course for Multimedia Instructional Design and Development

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized learning environment conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology setting

learning_goals: Learners can derive core elements of multimedia instructional design by analyzing real-world mathematics education cases
Learners can formulate strategies to resolve issues arising during mathematics curriculum development through case-based discussions
Learners can design mathematics education multimedia content based on case study findings in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
